sense.gloss: being in dire distress, being hard put to it, being hard pressed (for money)
the four and eight kinds of suffering (birth, old age, disease, death, parting from loved ones, meeting disliked ones, not getting what one seeks, pains of the five skandha)

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はノルマを↑果↑↓は↓たそうと↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓にがんばって↑四苦八苦↑↓|しくはっく|↓した。
sdata.e: We almost broke our necks trying to meet the quota.

sdata.j: レポートを↑書↑↓か↓くのに↑四苦八苦↑↓|しくはっく|↓した。
sdata.e: I had a very hard time writing the paper.

sdata.j: ホームページ↑作↑↓づく↓りに↑四苦八苦↑↓|しくはっく|↓してるようだけど、↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってあげようか。
sdata.e: You look like you're having a lot of trouble setting up that web page. Want some help?

sdata.j: パソコンを↑始↑↓はじ↓めた↑頃↑↓ころ↓はノートンの↑重↑↓おも↓いソフトに↑騙↑↓だま↓され↑四苦八苦↑↓|しくはっく|↓していた。
sdata.e: When I started using a computer I was taken in by Norton's CPU-hungry software and had a lot of trouble.
